extraction_method.description: UV-baked height map with blob detection and tick snapping

coordinate_frames.note: IMPORTANT: Centroid world coordinates and tick world coordinates are in different object transforms
coordinate_frames.explanation: The relief extraction was performed on a duplicated mesh object with different transform than the tick markers
coordinate_frames.impact: Absolute distances between centroids and ticks should not be interpreted as fit quality
coordinate_frames.resolution: Tick indices are correctly computed in local space and provide accurate ordering

results.monotonicity: VERIFIED: tick indices are monotone with respect to arc length

validation_checks.monotone_ordering: PASS: Tick indices increase monotonically with arc length
validation_checks.uv_banding: PASS: UV coordinates show clear horizontal banding for rows

usage_notes: This is a SURROGATE dataset for geometry-based analysis
Letter identities are not known - only positions
When real per-letter file arrives, map letters to tick indices
All downstream analysis should key on tick_index for stability
The 's' column (arc_length) provides linear position along panel
